response.original_title: ゴジラ×モスラ×メカゴジラ／東京SOS
response.overview: Mothra and her fairies return to Japan to warn mankind that they must return Kiryu to the sea, for the dead must not be disturbed. However Godzilla has survived to menace Japan leaving Kiryu as the nation's only defense.
response.tagline: No human being may touch the souls of the dead.
response.title: Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S.

titles.title: Gojira tai Mosura tai Mekagojira: Tôkyô S.O.S.
Godzilla x Mothra x Mechagodzilla: Tokyo S.O.S.
Gojira, Mosura, Mekagojira: Tōkyō Esu Ō Esu
Godzilla contro Mothra contro Mechagodzilla - Tokyo S.O.S.

release_dates.note: Fathom Events/Toho International 20th anniversary showings. Uses the Sony transfer & subtitle script. Screened alongside "Godzilla vs. Gigan Rex" (2022).
Columbia TriStar Home Video 50th Anniversary DVD. In Japanese w/subtitles + International English dub. Subtitles transcript the English dub instead of translating the Japanese dialog.
Sony Blu-ray titled "The Toho Godzilla Collection: Godzilla: Tokyo SOS/Godzilla: Final Wars". Same features as 2004 DVD. Packaged with "Godzilla: Final Wars" (2004) (two discs).
